name: 黃銘智
objective: 本課程旨在介紹研究快速原型之原理與方法，並藉設計實例演練，以達熟悉研究快速原型之操作與功能。
schedule:
1. Introduction to RP & Application
2. Design and Rapid Prototyping
3. Process of Rapid Prototyping
4. CNC vs. RP
5. The Format of STL
6. CAD Data Exchange
7. How to Perform Rapid Prototyping:
8. Classification of RP systems
9. RP application
10. RP application
11. Extending Technology
12. Extending Technology
13. Micro RP
14. Practice of rapid prototyping
15. Practice of rapid prototyping
16. Practice of rapid prototyping
17. Practice of rapid prototyping
scorePolicy:
專題製作：80％
平時考評：20％
